entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 21. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
